snippet: The attack targeted an Uzbek commander and killed at least six fighters on a base near the border with Afghanistan, according to a Pakistani security official.
abstract: Pakistani security official says American drone missile attack targeting Uzbek commander known as Usman killed at least six foreign militants at compound in North Waziristan tribal region near Afghanistan border.

byline.contributor: Salman Masood contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The attack targeted an Uzbek commander and killed at least six fighters on a base near the border with Afghanistan, according to a Pakistani security official.

headline.main: U.S. Drone Strike in Pakistan Is Said to Have Killed 6 Militants
headline.print_headline: U.S. Drone Strike in Pakistan Is Said to Have Killed 6 Militants
